# Kaplan-Meier Plots
```{r}
library(hedgehog);
library(survival);

# using example from survival package
km.plot(
    Surv(futime, death) ~ sex, 
    mgus
    );
```

```{r}
km.plot(
    Surv(futime, death) ~ sex, 
    mgus,
    show.risk.table = TRUE
    );
```
